PageText.pText: An operator is a symbol that tells the compiler to perform specific mathematical or logical functions. Arduino supports following types of operators.
Arithmetic Operators: addition (+), subtraction (-), multiplication (*), division (/), modulus(%) and assignment(=).
Comparison Operators: Logical equal to (==), not equal to (!=), less than (<), less than or equal to (<=), greater than ( >) and greater than or equal to (>=).
Boolean Operators: Logical AND (&&), Logical OR (||) and Logical NOT(!)
Bitwise Operators: Bitwise AND (&), Bitwise OR (|), Bitwise Exclusive OR (^), Bitwise NOT (~), Bitwise Left Shift (<<) and Bitwise Right Shift (>>)
